name: My Portfolio
description: Not much of a description needed here, you are looking at it! This portfolio was build with Vue.js and the Quasar framework.

name: Inventory Management System
description: This is a simple inventory management system that I built for my final project in my Software Engineering class. It is a fully functional inventory management system that allows the user to add, edit, and delete items. It also allows the user to view the inventory in a table format.

post.title: Tiny Toes Baby Co Inventory Management System
post.subtitle: Smart Inventory Managemnt for Etsy Sellers
